combinedline: For the transports to escape, someone needs to stay behind and pilot the cruiser.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Too many losses. I can't take anymore.

speaker: AMILYN HOLDO
combinedline: Sure you can. You taught me how.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: May the Force be...

speaker: AMILYN HOLDO
combinedline: May the Force be...

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: You go on. I've said it enough.

speaker: AMILYN HOLDO
combinedline: May the Force be with you always.

speaker: PILOT
combinedline: Cloaking device activated. We should be off their scopes.

speaker: LARMA D'ACY
combinedline: Let's hope this works.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Come closer, child. So much strength. Darkness rises, and light to meet it. I warned my young apprentice that as he grew stronger, his equal in the light would rise. Skywalker... I assumed. Wrongly. Closer, I said.

speaker: REY
combinedline: You underestimate Skywalker, and Ben Solo, and me. It will be your downfall.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Oh... have you seen something? A weakness in my apprentice. Is that why you came? Young fool. It was I who bridged your minds. I stoked Ren's conflicted soul. I knew he was not strong enough to hide it from you. And you were not wise enough to resist the bait. And now, you will give me Skywalker. Then I will kill you with the cruelest stroke.

speaker: REY
combinedline: No.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Yes. Give me everything.

speaker: REY
combinedline: No! No! No!

speaker: POE
combinedline: No. No. No, no, no!

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Poe.

speaker: POE
combinedline: What is that?

speaker: LARMA D'ACY
combinedline: The mineral planet, Crait. An uncharted hideout from the days of the Rebellion.

speaker: POE
combinedline: That's a Rebel base?

speaker: LARMA D'ACY
combinedline: Abandoned, but heavily armored with enough power to get a distress signal to our allies scattered in the Outer Rim.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Holdo knew the First Order was tracking our big ship. They're not monitoring for little transports.

speaker: POE
combinedline: So we could slip down to the surface unnoticed and hide till the First Order passes. That could work.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: She was more interested in protecting the light than she was seeming like a hero.

speaker: AMILYN HOLDO
combinedline: Godspeed, Rebels.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Well done, Phasma.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: Your ship and payment, as we agreed.

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: You lying snake.

speaker: DJ
combinedline: We got caught, I cut a d-d-d-deal.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Wait, cut a deal with what?

speaker: FIRST ORDER OFFICER
combinedline: Sir, we checked on the information from the thief. We ran a decloaking scan, and sure enough, 30 Resistance transports have just launched from the cruiser.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: He told us the truth. Will wonders never cease?

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: No.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Our weapons are ready?

speaker: FIRST ORDER OFFICER
combinedline: Ready and aimed, sir.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Fire at will.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Wait. No, no. No, you can't!

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: No!

speaker: SOLDIER
combinedline: Admiral, we're taking fire! Do we turn around?

speaker: AMILYN HOLDO
combinedline: No, you're too far out. Full speed to planetfall. Full speed!

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: Well, well, I did not expect Skywalker to be so wise. We will give him and the Jedi Order the death he desires. After the Rebels are gone, we will go to his planet and obliterate the entire island. Such spunk. Look here now. The entire Resistance on those transports. Soon they will all be gone. For you, all is lost. Ooh. And still that fiery spit of hope. You have the spirit of a true Jedi! And because of that, you must die.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: My worthy apprentice, son of darkness, heir apparent to Lord Vader. Where there was conflict, I now sense resolve. Where there was weakness, strength. Complete your training, and fulfill your destiny.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I know what I have to do.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Ben.

speaker: SNOKE
combinedline: You think you can turn him? Pathetic child. I cannot be betrayed, I cannot be beaten. I see his mind, I see his every intent. Yes. I see him turning the lightsaber to strike true. And now, foolish child, he ignites it, and kills his true enemy!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Come on, give it full thrusters. Full speed!

speaker: COVA NELL
combinedline: I am, sir.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You murdering bastard!

speaker: DJ
combinedline: T-T-T-Take it easy, Big F. They blow you up today, you blow them up tomorrow. It's just business.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: You're wrong.

speaker: DJ
combinedline: Maybe.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Ben! The fleet. Order them to stop firing. There's still time to save the fleet. Ben?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: It's time to let old things die. Snoke, Skywalker. The Sith, the Jedi, the Rebels. Let it all die. Rey. I want you to join me. We can rule together and bring a new order to the galaxy.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Don't do this, Ben. Please don't go this way.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: No, no. You're still holding on! Let go! Do you wanna know the truth about your parents? Or have you always known? And you've just hidden it away. You know the truth. Say it. Say it.

speaker: REY
combinedline: They were nobody.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: They were filthy junk traders who sold you off for drinking money. They're dead in a paupers' grave in the Jakku desert. You have no place in this story. You come from nothing. You're nothing. But not to me. Join me. Please.

speaker: FIRST ORDER OFFICER
combinedline: Sir, the Resistance cruiser's preparing to jump to lightspeed.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: It's empty. They're just trying to pull our attention away. Pathetic. Keep your fire on the transports.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: Execution by blaster is too good for them. Let's make this hurt.

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: Finn.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: On my command.

speaker: KAYDEL KO CONNIX
combinedline: She's running away.

speaker: POE
combinedline: No, she isn't.

speaker: PEAVEY
combinedline: No!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Fire on that cruiser!

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: Execute.

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: Finn! There's a shuttle back that way! We gotta go!

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: Traitor!

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: What?

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: Finn!

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: You are a bug in the system.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Let's go, chrome-dome. Come on!

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: No!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Hey.

speaker: PHASMA
combinedline: You were always scum.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Rebel scum.

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: Hey! Need a lift?

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: What happened?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: The girl murdered Snoke. What happened?

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: She took Snoke's escape craft.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: We know where she's going. Get all our forces down to that Resistance base. Let's finish this.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Finish this? Who do you think you're talking to? You presumed to command my army? Our Supreme Leader is dead! We have no ruler!

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: The Supreme Leader is dead.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Long live the Supreme Leader.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: They're coming, shut the door.

speaker: RESISTANCE SOLDIER (MALE)
combinedline: Incoming!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Go, go, move! Get that shield door down!

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: No! Wait, don't shoot! It's us! No, don't shoot!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Hold your fire!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Don't shoot!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Hold your fire!

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Finn?

speaker: POE
combinedline: Finn! Rose! You're not dead! Where's my droid?

speaker: POE
combinedline: Buddy! I'm so glad to see you!

speaker: POE
combinedline: Wait, what? Wait, wait, wait, slow down.

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: Is this all that's left?

speaker: POE
combinedline: All right, our shields are up so they can't hit us from orbit. Use whatever power we've got left to broadcast a distress signal to the Outer Rim.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Use my personal code. If there are any allies to the Resistance, it's now or never.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Rose, what do you got?

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: Rotting munitions, rusted artillery, some half-gutted skim speeders.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Well, let's just pray that big-ass door holds long enough for us to get help.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: A battering ram cannon.

speaker: POE
combinedline: A what now?

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Miniaturized Death Star tech. It'll crack that door open like an egg.

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: There has to be a back way out of here, right?

speaker: POE
combinedline: BB-8, what do you got?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: BB-8 has analyzed the mine's schematics. This is the only way in or out.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Come on. We have allies. People believe in Leia. They'll get our message, they'll come. But we have to buy time. We gotta take out that cannon.

speaker: SOLDIER #1 (MALE)
combinedline: On me! On me!

speaker: SOLDIER #2 (MALE)
combinedline: Move! Move!

speaker: RESISTANCE TROOPER (MALE)
combinedline: Go back! Gather your weapons!

combinedline: Get over here!

combinedline: Hold your fire!

speaker: SALTY (MALE)
combinedline: Salt.

combinedline: Ground forces, incoming.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Copy that, on our way.

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: Hey, engage your mono-ski. The green toggle.

speaker: POE
combinedline: All right, listen up. I don't like these rust buckets and I don't like our odds, but... what the hell? Just keep it tight and don't get drawn in too close till they roll that cannon up front. All right, ground forces, lay down some fire!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Thirteen incoming light craft. Shall we hold until we clear them?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: No. The Resistance is in that mine. Push through.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Fighters, break off! Come on! We gotta hold them till they pull up that cannon!

combinedline: I can't lose 'em!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Whoo! Yeah!

combinedline: BLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGHHHH

speaker: REY
combinedline: Whoo! I like this!

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Blow that piece of junk out of the sky!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: All fighters!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Chewie, peel off from the battle. Draw them away from the speeders.

speaker: POE
combinedline: She drew 'em off! All of 'em!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Oh, they hate that ship!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Chewie!

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: There it is! That is a big gun.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: OK, it's heavily armored. Our only shot is right down the throat. The cannon's opening. This is our chance.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: All firepower on those speeders.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Concentrate all fire on the speeders!

speaker: RESISTANCE CONTROLLER
combinedline: We're taking heavy losses.

speaker: POE
combinedline: They're picking us all off. We're not gonna make it.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: All right, making my final approach. Target in sight, guns are hot.

speaker: POE
combinedline: No! Pull off!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: What?

speaker: POE
combinedline: The cannon is charged! It's a suicide run! All craft, pull away!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No! I'm almost there!

combinedline: Retreat, Finn! That's an order!

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: Finn? It's too late! Don't do this!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: No! I won't let them win!

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: No! Finn, listen to Poe! We have to retreat!

speaker: MALE SCOUT
combinedline: The cannon is warming up now.

speaker: MALE COMMANDER
combinedline: Copy that. We see it.

speaker: MALE SCOUT
combinedline: Preparing to fire.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Move! Go, go! Quick!

speaker: SOLDIER #6
combinedline: Let's go, let's go!

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Rose? Rose? Rose? Why would you do that? Huh? I was almost there. Why would you stop me?

speaker: ROSE
combinedline: I saved you, dummy. That's how we're gonna win. Not fighting what we hate, saving what we love.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: General Hux, advance. No quarter. No prisoners.

speaker: KAYDEL KO CONNIX
combinedline: Our distress signal's been received at multiple points, but no response.

speaker: LARMA D'ACY
combinedline: They've heard us, but no one's coming.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: We fought till the end. But the galaxy has lost all its hope. The spark is out.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Luke. I know what you're gonna say. I changed my hair.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: It's nice that way. Leia, I'm sorry.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I know. I know you are. I'm just glad you're here at the end.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: I came to face him, Leia. And I can't save him.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I held out hope for so long, but I know my son is gone.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No one's ever really gone.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Master Luke.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Stop! I want every gun we have to fire on that man. Do it. More! More!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: That's enough.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: That's enough!

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Do you think you got him? Now, if we're ready to get moving, we can finish this.

speaker: SHUTTLE PILOT
combinedline: Sir?

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Bring me down to him. Keep the door covered and don't advance until I say.

speaker: ARMITAGE HUX
combinedline: Supreme Leader, don't get distracted, our goal...

speaker: SHUTTLE PILOT (MALE)
combinedline: Right away, sir.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Med pack! I need a med pack! She's hurt pretty bad.

speaker: POE
combinedline: It's Kylo Ren. Luke's facing him alone.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Well, we should help him. Let's go.

speaker: POE
combinedline: No, wait. Wait.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: Did you come back to say you forgive me? To save my soul?

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No.

speaker: POE
combinedline: He's doing this for a reason. He's stalling so we can escape.

speaker: FINN
combinedline: Escape? He's one man against an army. We have to help him, we have to fight.

speaker: POE
combinedline: No, no. We are the spark that'll light the fire that will burn the First Order down. Skywalker's doing this so we can survive.

speaker: POE
combinedline: There's gotta be a way out of this mine. Hell, how did he get in here?

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Sir, it is possible that a natural unmapped opening exists. But this facility is such a maze of endless tunnels that the odds of finding an exit are 15,428...

speaker: POE
combinedline: Shh. Shush. Hush. Shush up. Shut up!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: To one.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Listen.

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: My audio sensors no longer detect the...

speaker: POE
combinedline: Exactly.

combinedline: Where'd the crystal critters go?

speaker: POE
combinedline: Follow me.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: What are you looking at me for? Follow him.

speaker: REY
combinedline: If the beacon's right beneath us, they've gotta be somewhere. Keep scanning for life forms.

speaker: POE
combinedline: This way.

speaker: REY
combinedline: I see them! Chewie, there!

speaker: POE
combinedline: No. No, no, no. No!

speaker: REY
combinedline: Lifting rocks.

combinedline: I failed you, Ben. I'm sorry.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I'm sure you are! The Resistance is dead. The war is over. And when I kill you, I will have killed the last Jedi.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: Amazing. Every word of what you just said was wrong. The Rebellion is reborn today. The war is just beginning. And I will not be the last Jedi.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: I'll destroy her, and you, and all of it.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: No. Strike me down in anger and I'll always be with you. Just like your father.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: No.

speaker: LUKE
combinedline: See you around, kid.

speaker: KYLO REN
combinedline: No!

speaker: POE
combinedline: C'ai!

speaker: THREEPIO
combinedline: Such a friend.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: Chewie!

speaker: REY
combinedline: It looks good.

combinedline: That was crazy, man.

speaker: POE
combinedline: Hi.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Hi.

combinedline: I'm Poe.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Rey.

speaker: POE
combinedline: I know.

speaker: REY
combinedline: Luke is gone. I felt it. But it wasn't sadness or pain. It was peace and purpose.

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: I felt it, too.

speaker: REY
combinedline: How do we build a Rebellion from this?

speaker: LEIA
combinedline: We have everything we need.
